Text:
Great Documentary!

For 700mb this video is great quality.

V10/A10 , considering small file size.

There is an .idx ,but no .sub so I got an error in VLC and no subtitles. 
However, the srt file you can down load from here( http://subscene.com/subtitles/jiro-dreams-of-sushi/english/592208 ) works perfectly with the movie
Ditto, no subtitles. zen4153's fix works though. Right-click and "open file" the .srt file.

still, after all this time, people still go through all the effort of putting these files up, and yet offer NO FILE INFO whatsoever.

seems about as counter-intuitive as anything can be.

gabriel1475

i dont get this shit either
